matvec_in2out.title: Matrix File (in2out)
matvec_in2out.description: Read a 3x4 affine transform matrix+vector from file

matvec_out2in.title: Matrix File (out2in)
matvec_out2in.description: Read a 3x4 affine transform matrix+vector from file

tta2mni.title: Talairach to MNI
tta2mni.description: Transform a dataset in Talairach-Tournoux Atlas coordinates to MNI-152 coordinates

mni2tta.title: MNI to Talairach
mni2tta.description: Transform a dataset in MNI-152 coordinates to Talairach-Tournoux Atlas coordinates

matparent.title: Matrix Parent Dataset
matparent.description: Read in the matrix from WARPDRIVE_MATVEC_* attributes in the header of dataset

card2oblique.title: Cardinal to Oblique Dataset
card2oblique.description: Make cardinal dataset oblique to match oblique dataset

oblique_parent.title: Oblique Parent Dataset
oblique_parent.description: Make cardinal dataset oblique to match oblique dataset

deoblique.title: Deoblique Dataset
deoblique.description: Transform an oblique dataset to a cardinal dataset

oblique2card.title: Oblique to Cardinal Dataset
oblique2card.description: Transform an oblique dataset to a cardinal dataset

fsl_matvec.title: FSL Matrix Coordinates
fsl_matvec.description: Indicates that the matrix file uses FSL ordered coordinates ('LPI')

newgrid.title: New Grid Spacing
newgrid.description: Compute new dataset on a new 3D grid, with specified spacing

gridset.title: Gridset Dataset
gridset.description: Compute new dataset on the same grid as another dataset

zpad.title: Zero Padding
zpad.description: Pad input dataset with specified planes of zeros on all sides before transformation

verb.title: Verbose
verb.description: Print out some information along the way

prefix.title: Output Prefix
prefix.description: Set the prefix of the output dataset
